connector.description: Receive data from Kafka topics in batch through Plain Login Module and commit them manually through KafkaManualCommit..

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.topic.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.topic
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.topic.description: Comma separated list of Kafka topic names

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.bootstr.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.bootstrapServers
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.bootstr.description: Comma separated list of Kafka Broker URLs

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.securit.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.securityProtocol
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.securit.description: Protocol used to communicate with brokers. SASL_PLAINTEXT, PLAINTEXT, SASL_SSL and SSL are supported

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.saslMec.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.saslMechanism
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.saslMec.description: The Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) Mechanism used.

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.autoCom.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.autoCommitEnable
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.autoCom.description: If true, periodically commit to ZooKeeper the offset of messages already fetched by the consumer

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.allowMa.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.allowManualCommit
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.allowMa.description: Whether to allow doing manual commits

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.pollOnE.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.pollOnError
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.pollOnE.description: What to do if kafka threw an exception while polling for new messages. There are 5 enums and the value can be one of DISCARD, ERROR_HANDLER, RECONNECT, RETRY, STOP

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.autoOff.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.autoOffsetReset
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.autoOff.description: What to do when there is no initial offset. There are 3 enums and the value can be one of latest, earliest, none

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.consume.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.consumerGroup
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.consume.description: A string that uniquely identifies the group of consumers to which this source belongs Example: my-group-id

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.deseria.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.deserializeHeaders
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.deseria.description: When enabled the Kamelet source will deserialize all message headers to String representation.

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.batchSi.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.batchSize
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.batchSi.description: The maximum number of records returned in a single call to poll()

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.pollTim.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.pollTimeout
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.pollTim.description: The timeout used when polling the KafkaConsumer

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.maxPoll.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.maxPollIntervalMs
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-source.maxPoll.description: The maximum delay between invocations of poll() when using consumer group management
